title: Manage a Supplier Quality Issue
description: A batch of fasteners from a supplier has failed incoming quality inspection. A quality engineer must manage the non-conformance.

tasks.description: Create a non-conformance report (NCR) detailing the failed inspection results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a complete NCR with all required details.

tasks.description: Notify the supplier of the non-conformance and request a root cause analysis and corrective action plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal notification to the supplier.

tasks.description: Place the non-conforming parts in quarantine to prevent them from being used in production.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the inventory system to place the parts on hold.
